name: Chasmish Hero- MERN Stack Niche Product Website
details: Implemented different dashboard pages for users and admins. Admin can add and delete products and orders. Users can add and delete order. Email/password and Google login authentication implemented using Firebase. Technologies: React, Material UI, Firebase, AxiosJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB.

name: Ghurbo Tourism – MERN Web App
details: Implemented Node(express) server to operate CRUD operations with MongoDB. Users can place order and delete order. Users can login with Google and register with email and password. Technologies: React, React-Bootstrap, Firebase, AxiosJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB.

name: Dental Care – React Medical Web App
details: Implemented different dashboard pages for users and admins. Admin can add and delete products and orders. Users can add and delete order. Email/password and Google login authentication implemented using Firebase. Technologies: React, Material UI, Firebase, AxiosJS, NodeJS, ExpressJS, MongoDB.
